EPAM’s templates and presentations, case studies, white papers, brochures and other sales materials.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://elements.epam.com/image-library\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Image Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" -
